checkpoint

public void checkpoint(String id)
                throws IOException
Checkpointing a topic or a subscriber. The current timestamp is written to the checkpoint index type. Note that bulk index requests are used by checkpointing and flushCheckpoint() needs to be called after all is done.

Parameters:
id - topic or subscriber
Throws:
IOException
